holidays.title: National Give Something Away Day
holidays.description: Get rid of clutter, gift small things to strangers, and make the world a better place.

holidays.title: Celebration of the Horse Day
holidays.description: Celebrate these lovable creatures that have galloped their way into our hearts.

holidays.title: Developmental Disability Professionals Day
holidays.description: Keep reading to learn the history of Q.I.D.Ps, the N.A.Q., and changing terms.

holidays.title: H.M. The Sultan's Birthday (in lieu)
holidays.description: Get ready for the ultimate royal experience in Brunei with food, music, and fun!

holidays.title: International Snowdon Race
holidays.description: Best of luck to you if you’re competing in this 10-mile endurance run.

holidays.title: National Be A Dork Day
holidays.description: National Be A Dork Day aims to celebrate the dork in all of us!

holidays.title: National Clean Beauty Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the clean beauty movement — products that are mindfully created, and ethically sourced.

holidays.title: National Donna Day
holidays.description: Read up and get to know a bit more about this dainty name ― Donna!

holidays.title: National Gummi Worm Day
holidays.description: We still want more yummy gummi flavors, more colorful styles, and more silly sizes.

holidays.title: National I Love Horses Day
holidays.description: Honor horses by learning about their history, beautiful features, and excellent talents.

holidays.title: National Pet Fire Safety Day
holidays.description: A day to learn how to keep your pet safe in a fire.

holidays.title: National Respect Canada Day
holidays.description: National Respect Canada Day is the perfect chance to appreciate Canada.

holidays.title: National Strawberry Rhubarb Wine Day
holidays.description: Celebrate by grabbing a glass of yummy Strawberry Rhubarb Wine and making a toast!

holidays.title: NATIONAL TAPIOCA PUDDING DAY
holidays.description: Get your kitchen ready, prepare the ingredients, and make the best version of your tapioca pudding.

holidays.title: Orange Chicken Day
holidays.description: “Orange” you ready to grab chopsticks (or forks) and dig into this mouthwatering dish today?

holidays.title: Saint Swithin’s Day
holidays.description: Have your umbrellas or summer clothes ready because the weather is about to get ‘predictable.’

holidays.title: The Democracy and National Unity Day of Turkey
holidays.description: Find out the history of the failed coup of 2016, and how the people fought back.

holidays.title: Unimwane Day
holidays.description: Keep reading to learn the early history of Kiribati and how to celebrate this day.

holidays.title: Woodie Wagon Day
holidays.description: Before metallic cars, there were woodie wagons. Let’s honor the great invention of the woodie wagon.

holidays.title: World Youth Skills Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate World Youth Skills Day this July 15!

holidays.title: Damian Lillard’s Birthday
holidays.description: We can't wait to see what's next for Damian Lillard, one of the best basketball players.

holidays.title: Jim Jones’s Birthday
holidays.description: There is no limit to what this rapper and entrepreneur can do.

holidays.title: Lana Parrilla’s Birthday
holidays.description: An amazing actress and businesswoman, read on to find out why we love Lana Parrilla!
